Html:
Hello everybody,

I have a problem with this character "&".

If I use the function $section->addTitle(str $mystring), wherein $mystring contains the character "&", then when I open the generated document, Word says "The Office Open XML file cannot be opened because there are problems with the contents."

Thank you in advance for your help.

Damien

Just a precision, I don't have the problem with the function $section->addTitle(str $mystring).

It's strange !
